name: Bullet Chaos (serci98)
description:
===============BULLET=CHAOS==============

You are without legs and with just a shootgun, the only way to survive and move is shoot

—————————-—CONTROLS—————————

Space key to shoot a bullet and move

————————————XP————————————

You gain XP killing enemies, when you increase level your bullet will became bigger and more dangerous. The bullet can hit also you

——————————-ENEMIES——————————-

There are five types of enemy, every enemy makes a different damage, has a different speed and a different health
